document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Penasquito Project in North America dated August 2007.pdf
document.description: This report provides an update to the mineral resources and mineral reserves of the Peñasquito project, including new data from exploration and in-fill drilling as well as technical information regarding the project's development and construction status.
